template.title: Articles shown with custom HTML

property.title: Effect
property.helpText: Please select the effect that will be used to transition between items.

property.title: Speed
property.helpText: The transition speed of the selected effect in milliseconds (normal = 1000) or the Marquee Speed in a low to high scale (normal = 1)

property.title: Show items side by side?
property.helpText: Should items be shown side by side?

property.title: Items per page
property.helpText: If an effect has been selected from the General tab, how many pages should we split the items across? If you don't enter anything here 1 item will be put on each page.

property.title: Date Format
property.helpText: The format to apply to all dates returned by the Widget.

property.title: Background Colour
property.helpText: The selected effect works best with a background colour. Optionally add one here.

property.title: Text direction
property.helpText: Which direction does the text in the feed use?

property.title: Item Template
property.helpText: Enter text in the box below, used to display each article.

property.title: Snippets
property.helpText: Choose element to add to template

property.title: No data message
property.helpText: A message to display when no data is returned from the source

property.title: Copyright
property.helpText: Copyright information to display as the last item in this feed.

property.title: Image Fit
property.helpText: How should images be scaled by default?

property.title: Effect
property.helpText: Please select the effect that will be used to transition between items.

property.title: Speed
property.helpText: The transition speed of the selected effect in milliseconds (normal = 1000) or the Marquee Speed in a low to high scale (normal = 1)

stencil.twig:
<style>
#content, .text-render-item, .image, .image img {
    width:100%; height: 100%;
}
.image img {
    object-fit: {{itemImageFit}} !important;
}
{% if backgroundColor %}
body {
    background-color: {{backgroundColor}};
}
{% endif %}
{% if copyright %}
.copyright {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    text-align: center;
}
.copyright span {
    position: relative;
    font-size: 30px;
    line-height: 0;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
}
{% endif %}
</style>

template.title: Image overlaid with the Feed Content on the Left

property.title: Image Fit
property.helpText: How should images be scaled by default?

stencil.hbs:
{{title}}
{{{content}}}
stencil.twig:
<style>
html {
  /* Global font size, change for font scale */
  font-size: 16px;
}

#content, .text-render-item, .image, .image img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

.cycle-overlay {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  background: black;
  opacity: .6;
  filter: alpha(opacity=60);
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  top: 0px;
  width: 20%;
  height: 100%;
  padding: 0.8rem;
}

.cycle-overlay>div {
  font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;
}

.cycle-overlay .title {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.cycle-overlay .description {
  font-size: 1rem;
  margin-top: 1rem;
}

{% if backgroundColor %}
body {
    background-color: {{backgroundColor}};
}

{% endif %}
{% if itemImageFit %}
.image img {
  object-fit: {{itemImageFit}};
}
{% endif %}

{% if itemBackgroundColor %}
.background {
  background-color: {{itemBackgroundColor}} !important;
}
{% endif %}

{% if itemTitleColor %}
.title {
  color: {{itemTitleColor}} !important;
}
{% endif %}

{% if itemDescriptionColor %}
.description {
  color: {{itemDescriptionColor}} !important;
}
{% endif %}

{% if itemFontSize %}
html {
  font-size: {{itemFontSize}}px !important;
}
{% endif %}

{% if copyright %}
.copyright {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    text-align: center;
}
.copyright span {
    position: relative;
    font-size: 30px;
    line-height: 0;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
}
{% endif %}
</style>
